data.title: University of Ostrava
data.meta_description: The University of Ostrava is a public university in the city of Ostrava. It was founded in 1991 and has around 9000 students. Studying at the University of Ostrava places one in the middle of everywhere providing the opportunity to travel all over the European continent.
data.text:
Housing

Accommodation is available through the university, private dorms or private let. For more information on housing, go to: Fact Sheet - University of Ostrava

Cost of living

It is estimated that cost of living in Czech Republic is about 400 euros per month, depending on your lifestyle and place of residence. Housing typically costs 125-230 euros. For more information about estimated costs of living, go to: Fact Sheet - University of Ostrava

Admission requirements

Students must have completed one year of university level studies, equivalent to 60 ECTS.

Language requirements

English B2 is recommended by the institution.
